publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4899 Dennis Canavan on behalf of the European and External Relations Committee: Report on an Inquiry into Possible Co-operation between Scotland and Ireland—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the European and External Relations Committee’s 3rd Report, 2006 (Session 2): Report on an Inquiry into Possible Co-operation between Scotland and Ireland (SP Paper 607).
